title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 301.7 - Variances and exemptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 301.7 - Variances and exemptions

State Regulations
A banking institution which requests a variance or
exemption from the requirements of article II-AA shall make such request in
writing. All such requests will be considered on a case-by-case basis and must
comply with each of the specific documentary requirements of the provisions of
section
75-m
of the

Banking Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
301.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
